hopobject.name: chat
hopobject.body:
Beagle Board chat on Pibb.com

Pibb is a 3rd party service that connects to the Beagle IRC channel and is not always reliable. You can always join the chat directly using an IRC client to and visit us directly on #beagle on irc.freenode.net.

The chat window may take a minute to load.

This chat is connected to the #beagle IRC channel on freenode.net and is typically logged. For access to all of the chat threads on Pibb, you can visit the Beagle chat on Pibb.com.
